data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Mystrium (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) in the Indo-Australian region

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bihn, Jochen H., Verhaagh, Manfred (2007): A review of the genus Mystrium (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) in the Indo-Australian region. Zootaxa 1642: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273961
